word_mean: 痤疮，粉刺：毛囊皮脂腺的炎症性疾病。如为特殊类型，则通常冠以修饰语，单独使用时往往指寻常痤疮(acne vulgaris)
发生于颜面、胸、背等处的一种毛囊、皮脂腺的慢性炎症性皮肤病。

sentence.Network_en: Severe shock can bring on an attack of acne.
sentence.Network_cn: 严重的惊吓会造成痤疮突发。

sentence.Network_en: Acne often clears up after the first three months of pregnancy.
sentence.Network_cn: 粉刺在怀孕3个月后往往会自动消失。

sentence.Network_en: Students often find that their acne flares up before and during exams.
sentence.Network_cn: 学生们经常发现在考前和考试期间他们的粉刺会严重起来。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: via modern Latin from Greek aknas, a misreading of akmas, accusative plural of akmē 'highest point, peak, or facial eruption'; compare with acme

encyclopedia.content: 痤疮（pimple）是美容皮肤科的最常见的病种之一，多发于青春期，又叫青春痘、面皰或粉刺、毛囊炎，通常好发于面部、颈部、胸背部、肩膀和上臂。临床以白头粉刺、黑头粉刺、炎性丘疹、脓疱、结节、囊肿等为主要表现。除儿童外，人群中约有80%～90%的人患本病或曾经患过本病（包括轻症在内）。痤疮是发生在毛囊皮脂腺的慢性皮肤病，发生的因素多种多样，但最直接的因素就是毛孔堵塞。

entry.def: If someone has acne, they have a skin condition which causes a lot of spots on their face and neck.

means.word_mean: 1. an inflammatory disease involving the sebaceous glands of the skin; characterized by papules or pustules or comedones

sentences.en: A lot of teenagers develop acne.
Acne is very common among teenagers.
sentences.cn: 粉刺在青少年中间很常见。

sentences.en: Acne often clears up with a change in diet.
sentences.cn: 痤疮常常会随着饮食的改变而消失。

sentences.en: Doctors can treat acne with pills or creams.
sentences.cn: 医生可用药丸或药膏治疗粉刺。

sentences.en: He had terrible acne when he was younger.
sentences.cn: 他年轻时长粉刺很厉害。
